name: LoadEmUp
description:
A fun, quick highscore-based game where you  gotta join the blocks together and boom! With elements from the hit game Tetris, you'll sure to be grabbing that highscore! (lemme know yours in the comments!) Note: There is a bug where the music doesn’t play on mobile. I am yet to find a solution, but mobile is still a fun experience !

UPDATE 1.1: 

Updated game over screen.
